key.name: window-opacity
key.description: The opacity percentage of windows, from 5% (mostly transparent) to 100% (completely opaque).

key.name: apply-to-all-windows
key.description: When enabled, applies transparency to all windows instead of just inactive ones.

key.name: animation-speed
key.description: The duration of the fade animation in milliseconds, from 50ms (very fast) to 1000ms (slow).
